Text: i love it when you upload alot in one time :D
Don't be put off by the stupid title. One of the funniest movies I have seen in a very long time. A must see!
^ I was going to pass this one up but you convinced me for some reason :)

I too was going to pass on this movie because I thought it looked like some 
larry the cable guy b.s. but boy was I wrong! This movie is hilarious! Thanks HR your uploads are always awesome!
Passed on this for a while, then saw that Alan Tudyk was in it (played Wash on Firefly and Serenity), watched the trailer, and got it! Wonderful movie. Much thanks, HR!
